There’s only so much tread left on the tire
sacrifice his own glory at the order of his captain
dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: FAITH IS A TEAM SPORT / THE CHRISTIAN LIFE IS A CHAMPIONSHIP SEASON

kernfrasen: present your bodies as a living sacrifice

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: Getting to the World Series is more important.

doeldomein.theologisch_concept: Eschatological Kingdom / Teleology of the Church

mapping_structuur.doel_element: The Kingdom of God/Final Victory of Christ
God/Christ as Head of the Church

cognitieve_implicaties: Individual success is secondary to the group's objective.
theologische_implicaties: The Church has a specific 'win' condition (salvation/glory) that requires discipline.
ethische_implicaties: Willingness to be 'benched' or sidelined for the sake of the mission.
onbedoelde_consequenties: God as a 'manager' who uses people as tools for a result.

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: The preacher revitalizes the 'Body of Christ' metaphor by mapping it onto a contemporary, high-stakes sports comeback story.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The preacher successfully bridges the ancient sacrificial language of Romans 12 with the organic 'Body' metaphor and the modern 'Team' metaphor. The common thread is the subordination of the self for a higher purpose.

incoherentie_punten.conflict_beschrijving: Sacrifice implies total loss/death; sports implies winning/trophies.
incoherentie_punten.entailment_conflict: A sacrifice is consumed; a player celebrates.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: Functional mapping: both require 'members' with 'different functions' working for one 'head/manager'.

sterktes.beschrijving: Uses the David Cone story to make 'sober judgment' and 'humility' concrete and admirable rather than just pious.
sterktes.voorbeeld: There’s only so much tread left on the tire.

risicos.beschrijving: The 'World Series' metaphor might trivialize the cosmic victory of Christ into a competitive game.
risicos.voorbeeld: The ultimate 'world series' belongs to Jesus Christ our Lord.
risicos.potentiele_impact: Congregation may view faith as a competition with winners and losers.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: The Yankee Stadium / Baseball Diamond (The world of David Cone's comeback).
sub_worlds: The local parish of St. John’s (The 'Northwest Corner')

deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: High; connects the 'sacrifice' of a pitcher to the 'sacrifice' of the Eucharist.

versterkte_schemas.schema_naam: The Church as an Interdependent Organism
versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: By linking the 'Body of Christ' to the 'Team' where every member has a function.

verstoorde_schemas.verstoring_strategie: Reframing Romans 12 as a description of what God does, not a prescription of what we must do.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Excellent; uses the Prayer Book's 'Prayer of Humble Access' and 'Oblation' to ground the CMT analysis.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by the 'Body/Team' and 'Sacrifice' domains. It successfully moves from a concrete secular source (Baseball) to a liturgical source (Cranmer) to a biblical target (Romans). The landscape is one of active participation and grace-driven identity.

revitalisatie_suggesties.huidige_status: Can feel like a 'Dead Metaphor' or a 'Guilt Trip'.
revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Deepen the 'Living' aspect—how a sacrifice that doesn't die continues to function.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: Like a battery that is 'spent' but keeps the light on.

coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Pick one 'Team' metaphor and stick to it to avoid 'Metaphorical Pile-up'.

entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: A manager can trade or fire a player who doesn't perform.
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Explicitly state that in God's 'team', no one is cut from the roster.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To balance the 'performance' aspect of sports with the 'growth' aspect of grace.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in using a contemporary 'Living Metaphor' to unlock a dense theological text. The transition from David Cone to Thomas Cranmer is cognitively brilliant.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: An aesthetic analysis would praise the 'World Series' imagery for its color; CMT reveals it actually restructures the hearer's understanding of 'sober judgment'.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Kolb would focus on the 'experience' of the baseball game; CMT focuses on the 'mapping' of the game's logic onto the soul.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: CMT identifies that the preacher is using the 'Container' schema (In Christ) to redefine the 'Social Ladder' schema of the local community.

volledige_metafoor_lijst: Bible in one hand, newspaper in the other
appendices.notities: The sermon relies heavily on the 'Therefore' as a cognitive bridge between the indicative (what God did) and the imperative (how we live).
